text: Michael Rice (born 25 October 1997) is a British singer. He represented the UK at the Eurovision Song Contest 2019 in Tel Aviv, Israel, with the song "Bigger than Us". He finished in 26th (last) place with 11 points. He previously won the first season of BBC singing competition All Together Now. ==References== Category:1997 births Category:Living people Category:English singers
title: Michael Rice (singer)
